name: The Dukes of Hazzard: Racing for Home
name_original: The Dukes of Hazzard: Racing for Home
description:
The Dukes of Hazzard: Racing for Home is a racing-arcade game developed by Spellbound Entertainment and Sinister Games. It was originally released in 1999. Ubisoft Entertainment published the game.
The Dukes of Hazzard: Racing for Home is available on PlayStation and PC.
